text: The 2024 Silent Hill 2 game is a remake of the Silent Hill 2 video game, and was released for Windows and PlayStation 5 on October 8, 2024. The Bloober Team developed the game and was published by Konami. It is a sequel to the first Silent Hill game released in February 23, 1999. title: Silent Hill 2 (2024 video game)
